prop.name: textBezny
prop.titl: Under the Act on Revenue Registration, the Seller is required to issue the Buyer a receipt.\nThe Seller is also required to record the received revenue for the tax administrator to view online; or in the event of a technical outage at the latest within 48 hours.

prop.name: textZjednoduseny
prop.titl: Under the Act on Revenue Registration, the Seller is required to issue the Buyer a Receipt.\The recipient of the revenue shall record revenue in a simplified mode, and is required to record the received revenue with the tax administrator no later than within 5 days.

prop.name: danPriPrijetiPlatby
prop.titl: Tax is applied on the basis of payment receipt.

prop.titl: Inventory of receivables and payables at that date

prop.name: pokudPhl
prop.titl: If we do not receive a confirmed receipt or your statement of accounts receivable in %p, we consider receivables as approved and recognized.

prop.name: pokudZav
prop.titl: If we do not receive a confirmed receipt or your statement of accounts payable in %p, we consider payables as approved and recognized.

prop.name: potvrzeny
prop.titl: Confirm the form with eventually quantified differences by return to our address or e-mail to

prop.name: zadamePhl
prop.titl: We ask you to compare our reported status and your records. Please, for different receivables indicate your registered value or provide the relevant proofs relating to the difference.

prop.name: zadameZav
prop.titl: We ask you to compare our reported status and your records. Please, for different payables indicate your registered value or provide the relevant proofs relating to the difference.

prop.name: zakonPhl
prop.titl: Pursuant to Act No. 563/1991 Coll. On Accounting, as amended, we request the reconciliation of the receivables of our organization as at the date

prop.name: zakonSkPhl
prop.titl: In accordance with Act No. 431/2002 Coll. On Accounting, as amended, we ask you to reconcile the receivables of our organization as at the date

prop.name: zakonSkZav
prop.titl: In accordance with Act No. 431/2002 Coll. On Accounting, as amended, we ask you to reconcile the payables of our organization as at the date

prop.name: zakonZav
prop.titl: Pursuant to Act No. 563/1991 Coll. On Accounting, as amended, we request the reconciliation of the payables of our organization as at the date
